definition: to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Staying in Dong Fang is the best choice for your tour and business.
sentences.chinese: 下榻东方宾馆，是您商旅的最佳选择。

sentences.english: Latter is" East imperial place " Is emperor offers a sacrifice to the place which Taishan stays.
sentences.chinese: 后为“东御座”，是皇帝祭泰山下榻的地方。

sentences.english: Dear guest, Thank you for staying at Poly Plaza.

sentences.chinese: 我下榻在希尔顿大饭店。

sentences.english: All foreigners were mandated to stay in the Dong Fang Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 所有外国人都必须在东方宾馆下榻。

sentences.english: When Henry visited Paris he stayed in the royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 亨利国王访问巴黎时，在皇宫下榻。

sentences.english: Because his inconvenience when, that the flag to temporarily stayed curtilage yue home.
sentences.chinese: 因旗本家当晚不便当，只好暂时下榻宅悦家中。

sentences.english: We really proud that we can offer our British friends a recidence overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们为能够安排英国朋友在临海的寓所下榻感到骄傲。

sentences.english: Intermittent piles of snow still dotted the sidewalks of midtown Manhattan, where I stayed.
sentences.chinese: 我下榻在曼哈顿中城，人行道上还散落着一堆堆积雪。

sentences.english: The party were allocated room in the hotel annexe .
sentences.chinese: 旅游团的成员被分配到饭店的辅楼下榻。

sentences.english: The all employee of Qin's Anne's hotel's ising honored you very much can stay here.
sentences.chinese: 秦安大酒店的全体员工非常荣幸阁下能在此下榻。

sentences.english: I alighted at the hotel de madrid, in the rue de tournon .
sentences.chinese: 我是在导农街的马德里饭店下榻的。

sentences.english: Perfect base for your visits to Port Arthur.
sentences.chinese: 是您游览阿瑟港的理想下榻处。

sentences.english: But even his Airness is no longer off limits.
sentences.chinese: 但即使他下榻的不再是禁地。

sentences.english: Yin Changchun stayed with the Yamen.
We were guests of honor of the vice mayor. We were put in a nice hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我们被副市长奉为上宾，下榻高档酒店，太爽了。

definition: to put up a guest/to stay overnight
to receive sb/to grant an interview
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers
